title: My Motivation App - Free positive affirmations

creator: My Motivation
descriptionHtml:
On My Motivation App find a list of positive quotes and affirmations.

Free app to motivate yourself everyday, boost your well-being and develop your positive thinking.

My Motivation App can help you manifest and develop :
- Personal development
- Well being
- Positive thoughts
- Positive affirmations
- Positive mind
- Law of attraction

With My Motivation App, you will find a list of more than 100 free affirmations on various topics like money, health, well-being, love and abundance to stay motivated and keep a positive mind spirit.

My motivation App integrates several functions allowing you to stay motivated:
- List of positive affirmations: the application integrates more than 100 positive affirmations
- Random function: a random affirmation is selected to you in order to explore the affirmation list. The affirmation is presented on a graphical screen ideal for saving a screenshot.
- "Like" button: each affirmation can be saved with this button in order to easily find the positive affirmation that particularly motivate you.
- List of personal affirmations: create your list of personalized affirmations now by adding your quotes and motivational sentences. These personalized affirmations can also be saved in your favorites list.

My motivation App is a simple and effective way to centralize all your affirmations, quotes and positive thoughts in one place and stay motivated during the day.

Thanks to the law of attraction, these positive affirmations will be a good way to attract happiness, motivation, well-being, self-confidence, abundance and a positive mind.

This personal development app will also help you develop positive thoughts and manifest the law of attraction in your life.

As you probably know, if you read the Secret book, the law of attraction is a powerful law that can bring you happiness and self accomplishment in your life. To manifest positive things and positive thoughts, it is important to think and repeat positive affirmations every day and clearly ask what you want for your life and for your future.

My Motivation App, is a simple way to get positive affirmation, stay motivated every day and manifest the law of attraction.

------------------------------------
Be inspired, download My Motivation App : Free positive affirmations
------------------------------------

My Motivation App is a new app, we'll do our best to ad some function that can help you stay motivate !

- A list of positive quotes and affirmations.
- Your personnal notes to manifest everything you want

Free app to motivate yourself everyday, boost your well-being and develop your positive thinking.

My Motivation App can help you manifest and develop :
- Personal development
- Well being
- Positive thoughts
- Positive affirmations
- Positive mind
- Law of attraction

Affirmations / Positive quotes

- List of personal affirmations: create your list of personalized affirmations now by adding your quotes and motivational sentences. These personalized affirmations can also be saved in your favorites list.

Personal Notes
With My Motivation App, you can write your personnal notes to keep in mind everything you want, like :
- Personal quotes
- Motivation quotes
- Your manifesting list
- Your positive thoughts
- Your personal goals.

My motivation App is a simple and effective way to centralize all your affirmations, quotes and positive thoughts in one place and stay motivated during the day.

Thanks to the law of attraction, these positive affirmations will be a good way to attract happiness, motivation, well-being, self-confidence, abundance and a positive mind.

title: My Motivation - Affirmations

creator: My Motivation
descriptionHtml:
🔥 On My Motivation App find all the tools for your personal development:
- Your personal diary to write every day
- a list of positive affirmations to hand.
- your personal notes to attract all you want.

👉 Free application to find your daily motivation, boost your well-being and develop your positive thoughts.

My Motivation App integrates several features to stay motivated.

📔 Journal/ Scripting / Diary
Your journal to write every day, set your goals, your motivations, your emotions. Your personal journal is an important tool for personal development. No character limit.

🔥 List of Positive Affirmations / Motivational Quotes
With My Motivation App, you will find a list of over 100 free affirmations on various topics such as money, health, well-being, love and abundance to stay motivated and keep a positive state of mind while throughout the day.
- List of positive affirmations: the application includes more than 100 positive affirmations
- Random function: a random affirmation is offered to you each day to explore the affirmation list. The affirmation is presented on a graphical screen ideal for saving a screenshot.
- "Like" button: each affirmation can be saved using this button in order to more easily find the positive affirmations that particularly motivate you.
- List of personal affirmations: create your list of personalized affirmations now by adding your quotes and motivational phrases. These personalized affirmations can also be saved in your favorites list.

🔥 Personal Notes
With My Motivation App, you can write your personal notes to keep in mind whatever you want:
- Personal Quotes
- Motivational Quotes
- List of events
- Your positive thoughts
- Your personal goals
🔥 Paper books
Find in 1 click, your notebook to write your thoughts, your motivations and keep a diary up to date
My Motivation App is therefore a simple and effective way to centralize all your affirmations, quotes and positive thoughts in one place and thus stay motivated throughout the day.
Thanks to the law of attraction, these positive affirmations will be a good way to attract happiness, motivation, well-being, self-confidence, abundance and a positive state of mind.
This personal development application will also help you develop your positive thoughts and manifest the law of attraction in your life.
As you probably know, if you've read The Secret, the Law of Attraction is a powerful law that can bring you happiness and personal fulfillment in your life. To manifest positive things and positive thoughts, it is important to think and repeat positive affirmations every day and to ask clearly what you want for your life and for your future.
My Motivation App, is a simple way to get positive affirmations, stay motivated every day and manifest the law of attraction. You can also write every day and keep your diary up to date.
Don't wait any longer, download My Motivation App for free: Free positive affirmations.

My Motivation App is a new app, we are doing our best to improve the content and bring new features!
descriptionShort: My Motivation, your own Journal and Affirmations to get positive thoughts
